name: com.warwlock.advancedpostfxurp
description:
Advanced Post Processing effects for URP. Effects: 
 Ground Truth Ambient Occlusion (GTAO) 
 Auto-Exposure 
 Difference of Gaussians (Basic - Extended) 
 Object Outline 
 Advanced Tone Mapping (Custom3D - Shclick - Ward - Reinhard - ReinhardExtended - Hable - Uchimura - NarkowiczACES - HillACES) 
 Basic Edge Detection
author: Warwlock
